channel.title: [PI] Prayer against monster?
channel.description:
Does any1 know how to make an NPC Drain prayer? or when your in a certain spot not able to pray?
Please post reply helping me

item.title: [PI] Prayer against monster?
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

Make a minigame, or something, so when you’re in that spot, then you won’t be able to use prayer.

Or do something like the PK spots:

[code=Java]

public boolean inNoPray() {
	if(absX > coords && absX < coords && absY > coords && absY < coords ||
		absX > coords && absX < coords && absY > coords && absY < coords) {	
		return true;
	}
	return false;
}[/code]

And I’m not spoon-feeding.

Read full topic
